name: Millie's Messenger
description: Millie's Messenger is a live messenging app that can be used as a template for incorporating Socket.IO, MongoDB Change Streams, Express, React.js, Node.js and JSON Web Tokens/ Bearer Authorization. To test live site, login with username: Test  password: testuser

name: FotoBook
description: A social media app with login/ authorization, profiles, posting, commenting, and editing functionality. User can post Images and save them to your custom profiles collection that will display on the explore page. MERN stack. To test live site, login with username: Test  password: testuser

name: HAPI Hour
description: An app built to help user find drink recipes from the cocktail db API. You can search by name/ phrase, search by ingredient, choose a random drink, or start with a base ingredient choice and browse. React.js and thecocktaildb API.
